summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1161, for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue, from Arlington Place to East Union Street; and East Columbia Street and East Marion Street, each, from Thirty-second Avenue to the west line of the Stander Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary wooden gutters, curbs and crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 12930 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
